(About Crow Lord's council initiation thing and a few facts about getting on 
the Council.  


First off, Crow Lord's getting on the Council will be voted BY the Council 
itself.  Unless it is said otherwise by the Council itself.  


You have to earn to get on the Council.  It doesn't matter if you were 
originally in the RPG when BioStinger started it, or how long you've been in 
the RPG.  None of that matters.  The Council kind of has to want you in.  I'm 
just going on what happened with me.  If you ARE interested in the Council, 
talk to a Council member.  Zardus, JP3884, Inferno731, or myself, KSLawDogg.  
We all have AOL or CS (I'm the only one with CS), so you can IM us if you 
need too.  Or e-mail.  Saying you would like on.  But asking just isn't gonna 
get you on, you have to earn it. 

For example, roleplaying good helps.  You can't be a really bad moder and 
want on the Council.  It will never happen.  Being...nice...and courteous to 
other roleplayers.  Not calling them "bad names" if they shoot your guy and 
it ruins your plans of attacking someone else, or if your stasis pod lands 
and a Predacon reprograms you when you didn't want to be a Predacon.

But, unless it is said otherwise, please, stop sending seperate e-mails or 
including in your posts stuff saying you want Crow Lord on the Council.  
You're not on the Council, and for now at least the Council is voting.

Also, not official votes have been called for Iron Raptor to become leader 
instead of Liono Prime yet.  So please, stop with that.  Sorry if I confused 
you with my Anti-Liono Propaganda.  But we aren't voting.  Not yet at least 
that I know of)



Lord Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
